about: Throws a spectral copy of encounters shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the defences of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions
Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both slashes
The red slashes will have a chance to inflict bleeding
